name: Blood Test
description: Analyzes a blood sample for various conditions like infections, anemia, diabetes, and hormone imbalances.
purpose: General health assessment, diagnose various conditions

name: Urinalysis
description: Examines urine to detect abnormalities in kidneys, urinary tract, or bladder.
purpose: Detect urinary tract infections, kidney problems, diabetes

name: Complete Blood Count (CBC)
description: Measures different types and numbers of blood cells to assess overall health and identify potential problems.
purpose: Identify infections, anemia, other blood disorders

name: Lipid Panel
description: Measures cholesterol levels (LDL, HDL, triglycerides) to assess heart disease risk.

name: X-ray
description: Uses ionizing radiation to create images of bones and some soft tissues.
purpose: Evaluate fractures, infections, arthritis, and other bone or joint problems

name: CT Scan
description: Uses X-rays to create detailed cross-sectional images of your body.
purpose: Diagnose various medical conditions including internal injuries, cancer, and abnormalities in organs

name: MRI Scan
description: Uses strong magnetic fields and radio waves to produce detailed images of organs, soft tissues, bones, and the brain.
purpose: Diagnose brain disorders, muscle and joint problems, and some cancers
results_timeframe: May take several hours to interpret

name: Ultrasound
description: Uses sound waves to create images of organs and tissues.
purpose: Examine organs like the heart, liver, kidneys, and uterus during pregnancy

name: Biopsy
description: Takes a small tissue sample for examination under a microscope to diagnose cancer, infections, and other conditions.
purpose: Diagnose cancer, infections, and other diseases
is_invasive: Yes (may involve needles or surgical procedure
